description:
Experience six unique puzzle types in one pack stacked with more than 800 different puzzles. Challenge yourself with a wide variety of puzzles and various difficulty levels. If you are playing solo or with friends and family, Super Puzzle Pack 2 offers hours and hours of fun.

From challenging match 3 games to colorful and challenging puzzles, Super Puzzle Pack 2 has it all!

• Unleash your inner artist, paint by numbers and create paintings in pixel art style.

• Two challenging and colorful Match 3 games. Open your own flower shop, or go on a magical adventure and visit the forest village! 

• Challenge yourself to solve the most popular logical number puzzles: Sudoku – Binary – Suguru.

• Recreate in jigsaw form the most iconic historical works of art from masters like Rembrandt, Monet, Hokusai and many more. A master lives in you!
name: Super Puzzle Pack 2
intro: Super Puzzle Pack 2 brings together 800+ unique puzzles played across six different puzzle types. Play solo or with family and friends up to 4 players.
